item.title: Collaborative VR Scaffolding Assembly with Haptic Gloves
item.description: In an age defined by technological advancements, we present a project that converges virtual reality, haptic feedback, and collaborative techniques. Our collaborative scaffolding assembly application, set within a shared virtual reality environment, introduces a new chapter in the construction industry. Collaboration in the Virtual Realm: Imagine constructing complex scaffolding components alongside a partner, regardless of physical distance. Our project transforms this concept into reality. In a virtual reality environment, two users collaborate, each equipped with haptic gloves that offer a palpable sense of touch and interaction.
